div.p: For now I’d like to stay where I am and learn more I think and be able to just take more in just so I’ve got it there. But obviously I see things
that my colleagues do which really appeal to me, especially I think having been sort of a difficult young person I’ve kind of been through it so
I think in my service as well they help a lot of people like that and I think where I’ve been through it maybe one day I could do something
like that to help someone like me how I was when I was younger and I think I’m in the right place to be doing that one day and that’s what I’d like to do.
